name: dmecd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: 3bitr3d(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c3)), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)))

-| wi(w0, wb(wcel(c2, cdm(c3)), wcel(c2, c1)))

comment: Equality of the coset of ` B ` and the coset of ` C ` implies equivalence of domain elementhood (equivalence is not necessary as opposed to ~ ereldm ). (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 9-Oct-2018.)
